statements: SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE department='Marketing';
SELECT name, department FROM employee_profiles WHERE certifications LIKE '%Scrum%';
SELECT employee_id, name, training FROM employee_profiles WHERE skills='Python';
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT name, certifications FROM employee_profiles WHERE employee_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY name ASC, employee_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, department, skills FROM employee_profiles WHERE certifications LIKE '%Microsoft%' ORDER BY department ASC, name DESC
SELECT employee_id, name, certifications FROM employee_profiles WHERE skills = 'Java' AND department = 'IT' ORDER BY certifications DESC, employee_id ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE department = 'Finance' AND training IS NOT NULL ORDER BY employee_id DESC, name ASC
SELECT name, department, certifications FROM employee_profiles WHERE skills IN ('Python', 'SQL') ORDER BY department ASC, certifications ASC, name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT name, certifications FROM employees WHERE training_program = 'Management';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, position, skills FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' AND certifications LIKE '%AWS%';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, certifications FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' AND training_program IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, skills, proficiency_level FROM employees JOIN employee_skills ON employees.id = employee_skills.employee_id WHERE department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM EmployeeProfiles ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, department FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT skill_name, employee_id FROM Skills WHERE skill_id > 5;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM Certifications ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE department='IT';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, skill_name FROM EmployeeProfiles JOIN Skills ON EmployeeProfiles.employee_id = Skills.employee_id;

SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, certification_name, expiration_date FROM EmployeeProfiles JOIN Certifications ON EmployeeProfiles.employee_id = Certifications.employee_id WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS num_employees FROM EmployeeProfiles GROUP BY department ORDER BY num_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles;
SELECT name, department FROM employee_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM employee_skills ORDER BY skill DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM employee_profiles ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(certification) FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT name, age FROM employee_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, certification FROM employee_profiles JOIN employee_certifications ON employee_profiles.id = employee_certifications.employee_id;

SELECT name, skill, training_name FROM employee_profiles JOIN employee_skills ON employee_profiles.id = employee_skills.employee_id JOIN employee_training ON employee_profiles.id = employee_training.employee_id WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC, training_name DESC;
SELECT department, COUNT(id) AS total_employees FROM employee_profiles GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT employee_id, email, phone_number FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2019-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE issuing_organization = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT skills.skill_name, employee_skills.proficiency_level FROM skills INNER JOIN employee_skills ON skills.skill_id = employee_skills.skill_id;

SELECT employees.first_name, certifications.certification_name, employee_certifications.issue_date FROM employees INNER JOIN employee_certifications ON employees.employee_id = employee_certifications.employee_id INNER JOIN certifications ON employee_certifications.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
